thread.title: Dolly Parton Denies Having Cancer, Reveals Treatment for Kidney Stones
thread.title_full: Dolly Parton Denies Having Cancer, Reveals Treatment for Kidney Stones

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Dolly Parton Denies Having Cancer, Reveals Treatment for Kidney Stones
text:
Comments The 'Jolene' hitmaker says she has returned to work after having her kidney stones removed last month. 
Dolly Parton sets the record straight on the rumors surrounding her health issue after news broke out last month that she was hospitalized. She dismisses rumor that she battled cancer and, in the process, admits to having kidney stones. "It is true that I had kidney stones. I had them removed three weeks ago and I am doing just fine!" the country music icon said. "There is absolutely no truth at all that I have stomach cancer. I love and appreciate everyone's concern." The "Jolene" hitmaker is now back to work. "Last week I was at Dollywood filming parts for my new movie ' Coat of Many Colors ', which premieres December 10th on NBC. With the 30th Anniversary of Dollywood, I did a full week of activities promoting my new DreamMore Resort's opening," she revealed.
